snippet: The U.S. men's under-23 national team will participate in a two-part, 11-day training camp in California and Costa Rica as it continues to prepare for regional qualifying for the Summer Olympics in London.
abstract: The U.S. men's under-23 national team will participate in a two-part, 11-day training camp in California and Costa Rica as it continues to prepare for regional qualifying for the Summer Olympics in London.

headline.main: U.S. Team Continues Preparations for Olympic Qualifying
